review: I have 3 Rokus at my house.  The reason I got a stick is because I am on the opposite side of the wall where the router is.  I didnt want to cut into the wall just to put in a hard-wired cat5 cable so, this one solves that problem.  Additionally, the tv is mounted on the wall.  The Roku Stick hides nicely behind it.However, if you have access to hard-wiring using the Roku ethernet port to your router, get the Roku 2 or Roku 3 (the Roku 3 has headphones in the remote).  This will be optimal if you are watching Netflix or the like using your Roku.  The 2 & 3 also have a USB port so you can add a flash drive or external hard drive with all your movies, pictures and music... something the Roku Stick does not have.
author: karen
